mapper.select: select r.uuid,sc.name scName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo,true as used from share_history_record r,capital_flow_record c,share_card sc,merchant md where r.scId=sc.id and sc.shopId=md.id and r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId} and c.srUuid=r.uuid and c.state=${@com.cqgVipShare.entity.CapitalFlowRecord@YXF_STATE} order by ygxfDate
select r.phone,v.nickName fxzNickName from share_history_record r,vip v where r.kzOpenId=v.openId and scId=#{scId} and kzOpenId=#{kzOpenId}

select sc.`no` scNo,sc.name scName,sc.phone kzPhone,r.phone,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,r.qrcodeUrl,md.shopName,md.shopAddress,md.logo shopLogo from share_history_record r left join share_card sc on r.scId=sc.id left join merchant md on sc.shopId=md.id where r.uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.insert:
insert into share_history_record
uuid,
scId,
kzOpenId,
fxzOpenId,
shareMoney,
phone,
ygxfDate,
qrcodeUrl,
values
#{uuid},
#{scId},
#{kzOpenId},
#{fxzOpenId},
#{shareMoney},
#{phone},
#{ygxfDate},
#{qrcodeUrl},
